content.rendered:
My name is Abu Amina Elias (Justin Parrott). This website is dedicated to spreading the message of Islam according to the Quran, the Sunnah, the way of the righteous predecessors, and the scholars who followed them. Citations are always provided so that others can independently verify the authenticity of the information and inform me of corrections as needed.

I follow the way of Imam Ahmad ibn Hanbal in his understanding of the Sunnah. My creed is found in the texts of al-ʻAqīdah al-Ṭaḥāwīyah and al-‘Aqīdah al-Wāsiṭīyah, both of which I have translated on my website. I rely upon the great classical scholars such as Imam al-Tahawi, Imam al-Tabari, Imam al-Nawawi, Imam al-Barbahari, Imam al-Ghazali, Imam al-Qushayri, Imam al-Qurtubi, Imam Ibn Hajar al-’Asqalani, Imam al-Suyuti, Shaykh al-Islam Ibn Taymiyyah, Imam Ibn al-Qayyim, Imam Ibn Rajab, Imam Ibn al-Jawzi, Imam Ibn Qudamah, Imam Ibn Kathir, Imam al-Shawkani, and Imam al-San’ani. I strive with all my effort to take the best from their works and from the Four Schools, that which is in most agreement with the Quran and Sunnah, and I excuse their errors, as no scholar or school is immune from error.

I follow the senior scholars of our time, such as Shaykh ‘Abdurahman al-Sa’di, Shaykh ‘Abdulaziz Ibn Baz, Shaykh Ibn ‘Uthaymeen, Shaykh al-Albani, Shaykh Shuayb al-Arna’ut, Shaykh Ahmad Shakir, Shaykh Salih al-Fawzan, Shaykh Salih Ali al-Shaykh, and the Permanent Committee for Scholarly Research and Ifta. I look to them all for guidance, understanding, and verdicts based upon knowledge and piety. If they are correct, I obey them. If they are wrong, I ask Allah to forgive them and reward them for their Ijtihād (effort in seeking the truth). I pray for the guidance of our Muslim political leaders, even if they are oppressive, and I do not incite rebellion against them, as is the confirmed Sunnah.

Anything good and true that I say comes from Allah Almighty and then His Messenger, peace and blessings be upon him, and anything wrong and false that I say comes from myself, my ignorance, and Satan. I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Devil, lest he misguide me and I misguide others.

Please contact justin@abuaminaelias.com with your feedback.

Allah bless you in this life and in the Hereafter.

_________________________________________________________

FaithinAllah.org (precursor to Abuaminaelias.com) was founded on the 25th night of Dhull-Hijjah 1431 H, December 1st 2010 CE.

Daily Hadith Online was founded on the 27th night of Ramadan 1431 H, September 5th 2010 CE.
